mapper.select: SELECT yapply_id, applyname , approvename, dtime, folds, stat, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_youapply LEFT JOIN department ON c_youapply.department_id = department.department_id WHERE 0 = 0 and approvename = #{approvename} and stat='未审批' order by dtime desc

SELECT yapply_id, applyname , approvename, dtime, folds, stat, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_youapply LEFT JOIN department ON c_youapply.department_id = department.department_id WHERE 0 = 0 and department.department_id=#{0} and approvename = #{1} and stat='未审批' order by dtime desc

SELECT yapply_id, applyname , approvename, dtime, folds, stat, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_youapply LEFT JOIN department ON c_youapply.department_id = department.department_id WHERE yapply_id = #{applyId}

DELETE FROM c_youapply WHERE yapply_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT yapply_id, applyname , approvename, dtime, folds, stat, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_youapply LEFT JOIN department ON c_youapply.department_id = department.department_id WHERE 0=0 AND applyname LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{0},'%' ) and approvename = #{1}

SELECT yapply_id, applyname , approvename, dtime, folds, stat, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_youapply LEFT JOIN department ON c_youapply.department_id = department.department_id WHERE folds LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{0},'%' ) and approvename = #{1}

SELECT yapply_id, applyname , approvename, dtime, folds, stat, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_youapply LEFT JOIN department ON c_youapply.department_id = department.department_id WHERE c_youapply.department_id=#{0} and folds LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{1},'%' ) and approvename = #{2}
mapper.sql: yapply_id, applyname, approvename, dtime, department_id, folds, stat, bei
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_youapply
order by ${orderByClause}
